OrgName.entry: ST MARYS CONFERENCE CENTRE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: The Centre has a variety of rooms for hire for conferences, meetings and training courses (capacity 180), smaller rooms (capacities 12-30), also various break-out rooms. Can provide in-house catering and refreshments. Equipment available: data projectors, laptops, TV/DVD, flipcharts, internet access available in all rooms. External catering with delivery service supplying business lunches, wedding receptions, private parties and funeral catering.
